## Mandatory evidences

### Sequence diagram

_screenshot of the sequence diagram (**if apply**, e.g: new endpoint or data flow modified)_

_screenshot of the unit testing coverage report if we modify a piece or create a new file_

## Related issues

_background on features, hotfixes, or modifications that may be related to this change_

## Additional notes

_any additional information or considerations for the reviewers, such as affected areas of the codebase or how to start the application to review the change made_

# Merge Request Checklist

- [ ] The code was tested in a local environment.
- [ ] The documentation reflects the change made _(if necessary, e.g., a library or configuration change)_.
- [ ] The unit test coverage was maintained or exceeded _(npm run test:cov)_. **This check is mandatory and evidence must be in the MR description.**
- [ ] The code went through standardization and cleanup review _(npm run sonar or Gitlab pipeline)_.
